title: League of legends ingame chat bug
body:
My chat when typing is filled with ```````
They appear on vowels and in between everything else i type. 

"`Lè``a``gùè"  is how League would appear if i were typing in game. Only thing I have found on the topic is a post on the EU forums. (Guy has same issue but with ^)
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2102677

Ive tried repairing, reinstalling and updating keyboard drivers. The only place this happens is within the game. 
So im basically chat restricted every game for no reason. 

Ive had idiots tell me im scripting and all manner of crap. You get called toxic for both not talking and for the difficulty people have in reading anything I type.

replies.body: What language settings do you have set in your OS? Is it allowed to automatically switch when a program opens up?
If you are on windows, i can help ypu but if on mac, im no help

And what's your keyboard layout?

You still haven't said if or if there isn't anything in place which could automatically change your layout.
